content: bebe baby blanket crochet pattern <3 * this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find a free version of this pattern on my website www theturtletrunk com * difficulty beginner finished size 30 x 30 size is easily adjustable supplies needed -medium weight yarn 652 yards total -6 00mm j hook - yarn needle - scissors - tape measure you are more than welcome to sell your finished items but please give the turtle trunk credit as pattern designer if you have any questions about this pattern please feel free to email me my patterns including all photographs are copyrighted you may not copy re-distribute or sell my pattern due to the electronic nature of this pattern we cannot offer refunds or exchanges
